name: Pointless Platforming
description:
Have you ever played a game that was too engaging? Need something to cleanse your gamer palette?

Welcome to the limited world of Pointless Platforming. No complicated mechanics, no difficult learning curves, no emotional storylines, just a basic, mediocre platforming experience.

People may say: 

"But... What's the point of playing something without these key, fundamental features?"

Because Mr. Random Person, games are about fun, Pointless Platforming is about wasting an unlimited amount of time on a basic course, not having to focus on life!

Features:

- One intense level that will have you mildly engaged!

- No soundtrack to enable the use of listening to your own music! What could be better than what you, the player, pick out!

- Simple control scheme of WASD.

- Varying difficulty, new mechanics and a bland but fun time.
